resources.string: To host a quiz press the host button from the main menu it will create a hotspot network with your name. Tell every participant to, connect to your quiz\'s network.

To participate in a quiz press the Participate button from the Main Menu. It will open a screen presenting you with wifi network names available at your surrounding. Find the name of the quiz network that you want join in, then again open the application press the participate button again and wait for receiving questions.

This part will allow you to store questions which, you will be able to send to the participant when you will organise your quiz. To Add, Modify and Delete Questions you just need to Press the Question Store button from the Main Menu.
Quiz Organizer is an application that will help you organise small quiz events with the help of built-in wifi hotspot functionality of your smartphone.
